for _ in range(int(input())):
 n=int(input())
 a=list(map(int,input().split()))
 first=0
 last=n-1
 sseq=[]
 while(first<last):
  if a[last]>0:
   while(first<last):
    if a[first]<0:
     p=a[first]
     q=a[last]
     a[first]=q
     a[last]=p
     sseq.append(first+1)
     sseq.append(last+1)
     first+=1
     break
    first+=1
  last-=1
 sseq.sort()
 summ=0
 for i in range(n):
  if a[i]>=0:
   summ+=a[i]
  else:
   break
 print(summ)
 print(len(sseq),*sseq)
